snippet.title: Sega Saturn - Minami no Shima ni Buta ga Ita - Lucas no Daibouken (1996)
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
Minami no Shima ni Buta ga Ita: Lucas no Daibouken is an Action game, developed by Scholar Publishers and published by Virgin Interactive, which was released in Japan in 1996.
